reviews.review_msg: loves his material, and makes class fun and interesting.  Great Prof!

One of the only professors who has the ability to leave an everlasting impression. He creates a safe learning environment. He allows you to truly be yourself & that in itself is refreshing. The students who are commenting on his "pointless" stories clearly did not understand that each anecdote served a purpose and related to the lecture. He's a gem

The lectures were almost completely off-topic (literally). We talked about the professor's personal life about as much as we did the course novels. However, he's a very nice, accommodating professor & I would definitely take another class with him again.

He's Sweet, articulate, inspirational, and very well prepared for class.  He's very shy, but he gets over it once he gets going. Subject material is amazing.  His quiet ways are very endearing. I would take his class again and again. And I love his personal anecdotes!
